text: midneunjadeul-iyeo bulsinjadeul-eul chingulo taeghaji malla geudeul-eun neohui leul haechigi wihae nolyeog-eul akkiji a nihamyeo geudeul-eun danji neohuiga pagoe doegileul balal ppun-ila geudeul-ui ibdeul eseo jeung-oga balsandoemyeo geudeul-ui ma eum-eun deoug saaghadoda hananim-eun neohuiege geu malsseum-eul seolmyeonghaessnani jihyega issdamyeon alge doel geos-ila
